author.description: Curating digital dreams. Artist, poet; floating over pixels, weaving narratives in the ether’s streams.

text: In the book title El corazón sin Sentido (the Heart of Nonsense), by Mexican writer, researcher, and visual poet Alfredo Espinosa (Chihuahua, 1958): a poem-book whose pages sparkle with visual poems inspired by and in open dialogue with the works of Escher.
